oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Duke of Paducah war bond event
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: World War II-era event hosted by Duke of Paducah with various speakers and performances. Song selections include "I Threw a Kiss in the Ocean" and "Idaho."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified] talks about the war [incomplete] / (1:05) Duke of Paducah talks about war, bond shows, introduces Helen Seale [phonetic] / (1:50) Helen Seale sings "I Threw a Kiss in the Ocean" / (4:03) [Unidentified] talks about, thanks war volunteers / (6:15) [Unidentified] thanks volunteers, advertises bonds / (6:45) Doring Sisters [phonetic] sing "Idaho" / (8:30) Duke of Paducah thanks Doring Sisters, introduces Max Carr [phonetic] / (8:53) Max explains Music Industry War Council / (9:28) Duke of Paducah thanks Max, introduces Dick Stearns [phonetic] and His Orchestra / (10:05) Dick Stearns and His Orchestra play [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Duke of Paducah, 1901-1986
